pkgmetadata.longdescription: A collection of high performance c-string transformations, frequently 2x faster than standard implementations (if they exist at all). including * base64, standard * base64, web/url safe, with configurable alphabet * base85 (good for http cookies) * base16 (hex) * base2 (ascii binary) * url escaping * javascript string escaping * fast number to string conversion, 4-22x faster than sprintf! * fast ascii upper/lower case conversion, 2-66x faster than stdlib! (yes, 66x faster)
